ProjectTitle: Understanding and boosting the performance of organic thermoelectrics by a tailored molecular design guided by experiments and simulations
InitialFeedbackHistory:
16/06/2022
4. Documentation : From the description of the project it seems you will be developing new protocols, perhaps you can add information about those protocols in this section.
4. Metadata standard : You can consider using any standard file/directory naming conventions, such as from Edinburgh university:
https://www.ed.ac.uk/records-management/guidance/records/practical-guidance/naming-conventions
6. Data Preservation: Perhaps you can consider creating digital twins of lab books by scanning them and storing on KU Leuven storage infrastructure.
7. Data Sharing: Lirias is not for sharing datasets. KU Leuven has RDR data repository for this purpose: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
